bibl.title: Rollo mágico (PPalau Rib. inv. 200). Avec résumé en latin.
bibl.note: "Papyrus [probabiliter Xp] consideratur Palau-Ribes fundi, quae inter magicas (vel potius "aenigmaticas") papyros enumerari valet; earum enim constantes calligraphicae in hac papyro deteguntur, praxis vero quae his textibus subiaceat adhuc incerta manet."
bibl.seg: O'Callaghan José, Rollo mágico (PPalau Rib. inv. 200). Avec résumé en latin.

"Papyrus [probabiliter Xp] consideratur Palau-Ribes fundi, quae inter magicas (vel potius "aenigmaticas") papyros enumerari valet; earum enim constantes calligraphicae in hac papyro deteguntur, praxis vero quae his textibus subiaceat adhuc incerta manet."
